outputs.name: luminaires
outputs.description:
A list of Honeybee-Radiance Luminaires that are assigned to the
input _model.

inputs.name: _model
inputs.description: A Honeybee Model for which luminaires will be output.

code:
try:  # import core honeybee dependencies
    from honeybee.model import Model
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import honeybee_radiance dependencies
    from honeybee_radiance.writer import _filter_by_pattern
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_radiance:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    assert isinstance(_model, Model), \
        'Expected Honeybee Model. Got {}.'.format(type(_model))
    # get the honeybee-radiance objects
    luminaires = _model.properties.radiance.luminaires
    if luminaire_filter_ is not None:
        luminaires = _filter_by_pattern(luminaires, luminaire_filter_)
name: HB Get Luminaires
description:
Get Radiance Luminaires from a Honeybee Model.
-
